text:
Standard Chartered Bank | Singapore | Onsite | Engineers Front-end, Full-stack | Full-time

We are revamping SCB risk systems and are in the need of 3/4 full stack/front-end engineers. Great benefits, environment, opportunities and career growth.

Tech: ReactJS, Javascript, Java, PostgreSQL, Kafka, Docker, Openshift, ELK

Please contact me directly (email is in my profile). No recruiters pls.
